data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Huesca at San Mames.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Bilbao to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Throw-in for Huesca at San Mames.
Ball safe as Bilbao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Huesca.
In the minute 12, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Huesca throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bilbao are coming forward and Iker Muniain gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
At San Mames, Bilbao are penalized for being offside.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Huesca have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
The match at San Mames has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pablo Maffeo, who is down injured.
In the minute 22, Pedro Lopez (Huesca) has replaced the possibly injured Pablo Maffeo at San Mames.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Huesca's Javier Ontiveros gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bilbao goal kick.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Huesca.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Huesca at San Mames.
In the minute 31, Bilbao are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Bilbao are pushing forward but Asier Villalibre's finish is wide of the goal.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Huesca a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Huesca's half?
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Huesca.
Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Huesca.
At San Mames, Jorge Pulido has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Huesca.
Bilbao will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Huesca.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Huesca goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Javier Ontiveros of Huesca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Bilbao to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at San Mames.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
Alex Berenguer of Bilbao gets in a strike, but is off target.
Huesca have a goal kick.
Unai Vencedor is replacing Dani Garcia for Bilbao at San Mames.
In the minute 47, In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bilbao's Iker Muniain breaks free at San Mames. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Huesca a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Huesca.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Huesca's half.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Bilbao throw-in in Huesca's half.
In the minute 50, Huesca needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez waits before resuming play because Asier Villalibre for Bilbao is still down.
In the minute 52, Attention is being given to Huesca’s Dimitrios Siovas and play has been suspended briefly.
Bilbao’s Asier Villalibre is on his feet again at San Mames.
Dimitrios Siovas is back on his feet again.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Bilbao.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 57, Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Bilbao have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Huesca at San Mames.
Huesca are caught offside.
Michel is making the team's second substitution at San Mames with Idrissa Doumbia replacing Mikel Rico.
In the minute 61, Huesca make their third substitution with Rafa Mir replacing Shinji Okazaki.
Free kick Bilbao.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gaizka Garitano (Bilbao) is making a second change, with Kenan Kodro replacing the possibly injured Asier Villalibre.
In the minute 67, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Bilbao.
Idrissa Doumbia (Huesca) has received a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bilbao.
In the minute 70, Huesca have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Ander Capa with Oscar De Marcos.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
Throw-in for Bilbao at San Mames.
Jaime Seoane is on a sub for David Ferreiro for Huesca.
In the minute 73, Dani Escriche is replacing Borja Garcia for the away team.
Free kick Huesca.
In the minute 74, Javier Ontiveros gets his shot on target but fails to score for Huesca.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Huesca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 76, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a throw-in for Huesca, close to Bilbao's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Bilbao, Bilbao push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bilbao close to the penalty box.
Gaizka Garitano (Bilbao) is making a fourth substitution, with Oihan Sancet replacing Iker Muniain.
Jon Morcillo is on a sub for Inaki Williams for Bilbao.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Penalty! Valentin Pizarro Gomez points to the spot, great chance for Bilbao...
Throw-in Bilbao.
In the minute 86, Jorge Pulido has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Goal! Kenan Kodro gives Bilbao a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
In the minute 89, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Huesca throw-in in Bilbao's half.
At San Mames the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Bilbao drives forward and Kenan Kodro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In Bilbao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Bilbao move into a 2-0 lead through a Unai Nunez header.
Great play from Jon Morcillo to set up the goal.
